text: The 2018 Punta Open was a professional tennis tournament played on clay courts. It was the first edition of the tournament which was part of the 2018 ATP Challenger Tour. It took place in Punta del Este, Uruguay between 26 February and 4 March 2018. ==Singles main draw entrants== ===Seeds=== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! Rank1 ! Seed |- | |Laslo Đere |90 |1 |- | |Pedro Sousa |122 |2 |- | |Andrej Martin |132 |3 |- | |Jozef Kovalík |149 |4 |- | |Alessandro Giannessi |159 |5 |- | |Simone Bolelli |171 |6 |- | |Carlos Taberner |177 |7 |- | |Facundo Bagnis |185 |8 |} * 1 Rankings are as of 19 February 2018. ===Other Entrants=== The following players received wildcards into the singles main draw: * Daniel Gimeno Traver * Patricio Heras * Santiago Maresca * Nicolás Xiviller The following players received entry from the qualifying draw: * Juan Ignacio Galarza * Carlos Gómez-Herrera * Juan Ignacio Londero * Gian Marco Moroni ==Champions== ===Singles=== * Guido Andreozzi def. Simone Bolelli 3–6, 6–4, 6–3. ===Doubles=== * Facundo Bagnis / Ariel Behar def. Simone Bolelli / Alessandro Giannessi 6–2, 7–6(9–7). Punta Open
title: 2018 Punta Open
